analysis.key_quote: Any rule which results in government employees being designated as political appointees will result in reprioritization of their work to please the party or individuals currently in office, at the expense of the citizens whose needs they are paid (and, in many cases, sworn) to serve.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization and its negative impact on public service, indicating a clear stance against the rule.
